items.title: Rainy Drive
items.description: Waiting outside in the parking lot, reading a book while the wind blows.

items.title: Solar Yacht
items.description: The ship has entered Earth's orbit.  Engines set to idle.

items.title: Hyperspace Passage
items.description: The trip to Ganymede will be uneventful.  Sleep is encouraged.

items.title: Lighthouse Downpour
items.description: The clouds pulse but the lighthouse stands strong.

items.title: Raining in Rio
items.description: When the clouds let loose, the rainforest comes awake.
